  • Constructor Details

    • Boid

      public Boid​(Point2D.Double coo, Point2D.Double speed, Point2D.Double accel, int radius, Color color)
      Constructor of the Boid object. The Boid is here seen as circle with special attributes.
      Parameters:
      coo - is the coordinates of the Boid
      speed - is the speed vector of the Boid
      accel - is the force vector applied on the Boid
      radius - is the radius of the circle representing the Boid
      color - is the color of the Boid

    • Boid

      public Boid​(Boid boid)
      Constructor of the Boid object.
      Parameters:
      boid - is the Boid object that we want to create

      public void update​(int x_max, int y_max)
      Method updating the position of the Boid by taking into account the Borders
      Overrides:
      update in class Ball
      Parameters:
      x_max - is the x coordinate of the border not to cross
      y_max - is the y coordinate of the border not to cross

    • distanceTo

      public double distanceTo​(Boid boid)
      Method calculating the distance between a specified Boid and our current Boid.
      Parameters:
      boid - is the Boid for which we want to calculate the distance to our current Boid.
      Returns:
      the distance of the specified Boid to our current Boid

    • sees

      public boolean sees​(Boid boid)
      Method calculating if our current Boid sees the specified Boid.
      Parameters:
      boid - is the Boid for which we want to know if he is seen or not by our current
      Returns:
      is the boolean worthing true if our current Boid is able to see the specified Boid.
